summary: Implements detection and configuration for jobs running under the LSF resource manager, exposing cluster topology (global/local ranks, world size, node rank), main node address and port, and handling LSF‑specific environment variables needed for distributed execution.
business_intent: Allow distributed workloads (e.g., training jobs) to run on LSF‑managed clusters by abstracting LSF environment details and providing a uniform interface for rank, size, and networking information required for coordinated process launch.
